summary: A conversion of nsk13s Gwelda Armor Pack UNP for use with CBBE bodies. BBP, TBBP and BodySlideable.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][b]The quality of this conversion is very poor, I do not recommend using it, however people still ask to me to reopen it and so I am leaving it here for those who aren't bothered by it's imperfections.[/b][/size]

This is a conversion of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56998/?]Gwelda Armor Pack UNP[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3373573/?]nsk13[/url].
All three armours - Dawnguard, Vampire & Witch - are converted for use with CBBE Bodies.

[/size][/font][font=Tahoma][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61970-1-1422084753.png[/img]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/1704/images/3906-0-1479864506.png[/img]
[/font][size=5][font=Tahoma][font=Tahoma][size=2][b][size=4][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][size=4][b][color=#000000]×[/color][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font] Requirements [/size][/b][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][size=4][b][color=#000000]×[/color][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font][/size][/font][/font][font=Tahoma][size=2]
-[/size][/font][/size][font=Tahoma][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56998/?] Gwelda Armor Pack UNP[/url]. [font=Tahoma][size=2]Must be installed first. Override with my mod.[/size][/font]
-[/size][/font][font=Tahoma][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?] HDT HighHeels System[/url] is always required.[/size][/font]
[font=Tahoma][size=2]- Caliente's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Beautiful Bodies Edition[/url] body meshes.[/size][/font][font=Tahoma]


[size=5][/size][font=Tahoma][font=Tahoma][size=2][b][size=4][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][size=4][b][color=#000000]×[/color][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font] Acquisition [/size][/b][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][size=4][b][color=#000000]×[/color][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font][/size][/font][/font]

[/font][font=Tahoma]All armor pieces can be found inside a small chest, on a ledge outside of Warmaiden's in Whiterun.

[/font][font=Tahoma][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61970-1-1422084406.png[/img][/font][font=Tahoma]

[size=5][font=Tahoma][font=Tahoma][size=2][b][size=4][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][size=4][b][color=#000000]×[/color][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font] Credits [/size][/b][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][size=4][b][color=#000000]×[/color][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font][/size][/font][/font][font=Tahoma][/font][/size]

[font=Tahoma]Original UNP mod and all texture work belong to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3373573]nsk13[/url].[/font]

[font=Tahoma][size=2]Hair Meshes: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] by Apachii[/size][/font].
[size=2]Armor Meshes: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376/?]UNP Minidresses Collection[/url] by Tiwa44.
Armlets, Bracers, Hood & Cloak Meshes: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18008/?]Ashara Princes of the Woods[/url] by SydneyB.
Cuisse, Socks, Stockings & Trousers Mesh: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24444/?]UNP Undies[/url] by Petrovich.
[font=Tahoma][size=2][font=Tahoma][size=2]Collar Mesh: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15529/?]R18Pn Set - Inner Wear Set[/url] by NPR.[/size][/font][/size][/font]
Boots Mesh: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43381/?]Bobs Boots[/url] by Beazalbob69.[/size]

[font=Tahoma]Huge thanks to the entire team behind [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide 2 & Outfit Studio[/url] - without which this conversion would not have been possible.[/font]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/1704/images/3906-0-1479864506.png[/img]
This mod is a Nexus exclusive! Please do not upload it anywhere else.
[/font][/center]
author: Mitosuke
